Title: Object: La tentation de saint Antoine
Description: The temptation of St Anthony; the saint to left kneeling before a cross, two demons presenting him a woman, other demons pointing at a love scene in the air, a devil on a monster in the left foreground, to right five disguised devils. 1853 Etching
Producer name: Print made by: Hendrik Frans Schaefels
Curator's comments: For an impression of sixth state see 1888,0612.1175.
Bibliographic references: Le Blanc 1854-89 / Manuel de l'Amateur d'Estampes 1550-1820 (14.III)
Hippert & Linnig 1874-9 / Le Peintre-Graveur Hollandais et Belge du dix-neuvième siècle (14.III)
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
